name: slonominsky-scales
description: Slonimsky-inspired scale/pattern engine with deterministic realization, MIDI and guitar LFV export

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p=require('path'); const src=p.join(process.cwd(),'src','library','patterns'); const dest=p.join(process.cwd(),'dist','library','patterns'); if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); for(const f of fs.readdirSync(src)){if(f.endsWith('.json'))fs.copyFileSync(p.join(src,f),p.join(dest,f));}}"
